margin--l-none.title: No left margin
margin--l-none.description: Removes all margin from the left.

margin--l-xs.title: Tiny left margin
margin--l-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of margin to the left.

margin--l-sm.title: Small left margin
margin--l-sm.description: Adds a small amount of margin to the left.

margin--l-md.title: Medium left margin
margin--l-md.description: Adds a medium amount of margin to the left.

margin--l-lg.title: Large left margin
margin--l-lg.description: Adds a large amount of margin to the left.

margin--l-xl.title: Extra-large left margin
margin--l-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of margin to the left.

margin--l-xxl.title: Double-extra-large left margin
margin--l-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of margin to the left.
